EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Wednesday 10/29 at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up next Wednesday in Scottsdale. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Wednesday, October 29, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/phoenix>
FireSky Resort Fuego Conference Room 4925 North Scottsdale Road (on the SE corner of Chaparral) Scottsdale, AZ 85251 Map and Driving Directions <http://www.fireskyresort.com/scottsdale/map.html>
Parking Information Complimentary self-parking and complimentary valet parking are available onsite.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or via cell at 408-425-9302 <tel:408-425-9302>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/phoenix>.
